summary: “muggle-repelling charms on every inch of it. every time muggles have got anywhere near here all year, they’ve suddenly...
caption:
“muggle-repelling charms on every inch of it. every time muggles have got anywhere near here all year, they’ve suddenly remembered urgent appointments and had to dash away again.”

– arthur weasley

want to play wizards and no-maj and squibs and beasts? in a setting that isn’t hogwarts? for characters 18+? join repello muggletum! we are what you could call a city-town rpg with the charm of harry potter! canton bay, ma, is a city formed by wizards after the salem witch trials. as centuries and decades went by, it slowly opened up its doors to no-maj aware of magic. however, there are some in canton bay who strongly oppose them and would like to see them out of the city (or worse).

[ index ]  [ plot ]  [ rules ]  [ faces ]  [ wanteds ]  [ discord ]

summary: remus is in a band, and sirius is in the audience
question: remus is in a band, and sirius is in the audience
answer:
plz be fully aware that the characterisation in this is shit, if ur looking for quality content go stalk @moonyandthestar or @lumosinlove

sirius’ band was shit.

well, maybe not shit, they just hadn’t had their big break that sirius’ bandmate, johnny, insisted would happen bloody soon. for the time being the four-man band simply booked small gigs in pubs or charity events and what not.

on this particular evening they had an audience of about twelve and the pub was so small that the drummer hardly had enough room to set up. they just had to make the best of it, playing their set and accepting the weak round of applause as they attempted to plug their social media that currently had a staggering fifty one followers.

nothing out of the ordinary really. the guys packed up their things at the end and prepared to head home for drinks. sirius was carrying his guitar case out to the car when he dropped it right onto his foot, swearing loudly and trying not to lose his temper. he was already frustrated from all these chicken shit gigs. he rammed his guitar into the back of the car and then leaned against the hood so he could light himself a cigarette.

“you were pretty great tonight.”

a voice came from behind him and he turned his head to see a tall, handsome stranger with freckles covering his face. he had curly hair and a scarf wrapped tightly around his neck that he’d tucked down the front of his long woollen coat.

“lot better than most of the shitty bands we usually get. had a guy last week who went on drunk then threw up on the amp.”

sirius snorted at that, straightening up so he was no longer learning on the car and turning to look at the stranger.

“thanks. you one of the regulars here, then?”

sirius asked, and the man nodded.

“my father used to own the place. sort of gone to shit since he died but i still end up here when i fancy cheap beer and soggy chips.”

sirius laughed again, the stranger doing a very good job of making him feel less shit.

“i’m sirius black. like you just saw, i’m the guitarist and singer.”

he gestured vaguely to the pub, the man turning his head as if there was something there to look at before nodding.

“remus lupin. pleasure.”

remus reached out to shake sirius’ hand in greeting and sirius gave his hand a firm squeeze. at least someone was appreciating how hard sirius and his bandmates tried make good music.

speaking of the bastards, johnny, jed and david came rowdily staggering out the pub, shoving each other and laughing jovially. when they spotted sirius stood with remus they started cheering (david), laughing (jed) and whistling (johnny). sirius rolled his eyes and dropped his cigarette to put it out under his boot.

“sirius is gonna pull! pads is gonna get lucky! hah! you go, girl!”

the three men teased, jed even Z-snapping at the end of his heckle. sirius simply pinched the bridge of his nose and shook his head.

“oi, you horny bastards, i’m just talking to him.”

sirius hollered back, remus seeming rather amused at the whole thing.

“sorry about them. post show shots always make them exceptionally obnoxious.”

sirius said, rolling his eyes, but remus just chuckled and shook his head.

“oh, it’s fine.”

he replied simply, then paused.

“here.”

he said, reaching out to take sirius’ hand. he pushed his sleeve up and used a pen that he pulled out his pocket to write down a phone number. his phone number.

“for if you’d like to talk some more.”

sirius looked blatantly surprised, not even caring that the other guys were still whistling as they observed this interaction. remus smiled softly, his cheeks a little red whether that be from the cold or from having just very boldly given a very attractive man his number.

sirius was left in a stunned silence by this stranger. he stared at his arm and after a good few minutes of sitting in his car simply processing what had happened, he drove himself home and the minute he arrived he texted the number.

reblog.comment:
plz be fully aware that the characterisation in this is shit, if ur looking for quality content go stalk @moonyandthestar or @lumosinlove

summary: Hi! I’m accepting in-character questions! Feel free to ask whatever you want!

Hi! I’m accepting in-character questions! Feel free to ask whatever you want!

You can ask questions to the following on this blog:

  • Lottie Southernwood
  • Marigold Fawley
  • Aeswyn “Ace” Horne

summary:
Peter: could you see someone's patronus if it was a demiguise?
James: could you see someone's patronus if it was a thestral and...
body:
Peter: could you see someone's patronus if it was a demiguise?
James: could you see someone's patronus if it was a thestral and you hadn't seen death?
Sirius: could you see someone if they were an animagus and transformed into a thestral but hadn't seen death?
Remus: SHUT THE FUCK UP IT IS 2 AM

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

blog.name: ao3feed-tomarrymort
blog.title: Tomarrymort On AO3
blog.description: An automated feed for the Tom/Harry and Voldemort/Harry AO3 tags. Not a fic recs blog.

title: Souls
description:
by BeliefIs

After dying in battle, the Dark Lord and the Chosen One were reincarnated. Only, in a different world from theirs.

Words: 1391, Chapters: 2/?, Language: English

  • Fandoms: Naruto, Harry Potter - J. K. Rowling
  • Rating: Teen And Up Audiences
  • Warnings: Creator Chose Not To Use Archive Warnings
  • Categories: F/M
  • Relationships: Harry Potter/Tom Riddle | Voldemort
  • Additional Tags: Female Harry Potter, Alternate Universe - Reincarnation, Healer Harry Potter, Inaccuracies

Ella•Hufflepuff with Slytherin tendencies•fangirl af

One day my life will not revolve around fictional characters. Today is not that day

Background by alek-r

summary:
*Gryffindor Boys Dorm at 3am*
Sirius: How can you tell the gender of an ant?
Remus: Go to sleep Sirius
Sirius: Put it in some...
body:
*Gryffindor Boys Dorm at 3am*

Sirius: How can you tell the gender of an ant?

Remus: Go to sleep Sirius

Sirius: Put it in some water. If it sinks, it’s a girl ant. If it floats, it’s a buoyant.

Remus: GO TO SLEEP SIRIUS

Remus: Yes.

body:
Sirius: Ok, so now that I’ve explained the plan for the last 30 minutes, do you understand?

Remus: Yes.

Sirius: Are you lying to me?

Remus [voice breaks]: Yes

summary: voldemort’s first death eaters, previously known as the knights of walpurgis. they are among his longest serving and most...
caption:
voldemort’s first death eaters, previously known as the knights of walpurgis. they are among his longest serving and most faithful of followers, though to what degree their loyalty has strengthened/wavered over the years is entirely up to you. however, it’s unlikely that they would have strayed too far from seeing voldemort’s ultimate goal come to light. 

halys is a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we’ve pushed out some timeline updates, and now is the perfect time to join our community & build our AU from the ground up!

→ INDEX | PLOT & CONCEPT | CANON LIST | SUBPLOTS | REQUEST: BEAT THE DEVIL’S TATTOO

tags: harry potter as things I've said
harry potter as things my family have said
summary: Harry Potter characters as things my family and I have said
title: Harry Potter characters as things my family and I have said
body:
Luna:  “Drinking milk through a straw while dipping a pop-tart in it is like drinking someone’s bathwater while they’re in the bath.”

“ when my mom took a bite out of my sandwich, she said it was ‘special bread that was like that at the store.“ and I believed her. “

“ if you punch someone in the stomach, you’re technically also punching them in the mouth. “

Voldemort: “ Spookley tried to think back to childhood, which was rather hard without a brain. "Chatter,” he said, for without a tongue he could not say anything else. The onomatopoeia hung in the air, like leaves on a spiderweb hanging off an old, creepy tree. “ 

 “ Anyone remember that phase I went through when I’d drink water through my nose? I do”

Harry: “#Life hack: use humor to get over fear. Girl with blood running down her face trying to steal your soul? Say she needs chill lay off the fruit punch.” 

  “props to my brain for gently easing me into the ghost story on the radio. I thought it was a commercial for soy sauce humidifiers. No idea what those are, but that’s what I thought it was until it got to the part with the mysterious whistling noise and ghost kids running across the back porch.

 “ 'Repost or she’ll be in your room at 3am’?   Jokes on you, I won’t be in my room at 3am”

“ found out Monopoly (the board game) was invented before WWI and WWII…i think i know what caused those “

Fred: “ I am auctioning off my chocolate popcorn for free! Only 10$ per piece! No refunds! Love it or your money back! ” 

 “ WHY DO SOME PEOPLE NOT LIKE CANDY CORN IT’S GREAT AND YOU CAN USE IT FOR POKER BELIEVE ME I HAVE “

“i swear sometimes my mouth seems like it has autocomplete. wildly inaccurate autocomplete. “

George: *wearing a spider-man costume*  “I know Batman has pretty shredded abs, but Spider-Man does too! “ 

“ That awkward moment when you make a Yo Mama joke on your sibling “

(In connection to the above autocomplete quote) “ for example i started to say as i was saying, but instead said "At the same time as i was saying.”

Draco:  “No regrets,” I say, already feeling regrets”  

 (about choosing a tv show) “ and people say choosing a College is tricky ooh big deal it’s the next four years of your life this is my Saturday night!” 

  “Sharpay. Sharpay is the most delicious thing on the whole dang planet”

Ron: “ Tell me why! (Ain’t nothin but a heartache) Tell me why! (ain’t nothin but a milkshake) “ 

” Hope my FBI agent(in my camera) just got a good  look at the Almond Joy snack mix he’s not getting any of! “

“Hamilton during Say No To This is me when I’m already full but my sister isn’t going to finish her dessert “

Hermione: “ Malfoy shut up you’re like ten “ 

 “ Scientific studies have shown that existing on Earth is the leading cause of death in human beings “

Ginny:  “I will dislocate your children”

 “ So the first time I heard about the Winchesters (from Supernatural), I thought they was talking about the lady who had to build that haunted house. “

(to Fleur) “ Don’t get all french with me “

Dumbledore:  “Why does pain exist, but as a harsh reminder of reality?
Why do Pringles taste so good, but so sal-i-ty? ”

 “The words “dang, son” have become a permanent part of my inner monologue”

Hagrid: “ I would kill someone if they hurt my hypothetical cat. For real, Filch is a jerk but I mean his rage over Mrs Norris is totally understandable “

Lavender:  “ My brain is so weird. I read the words "scrabble tournament” and then saw a picture of a squirrel. I was fine. Then there was a picture of a cute guy and my brain malfunctioned and I got “squirrel tournament”

 “ She was currently locking lips with her future husband I mean what I didn’t say anything “

Bellatrix:  “That’s a sexy zombie." 

 “ I can see why people call their significant other food names cause food is the best thing in the world so they call each other food names like Sugar Honey Baby and Cheeseburger “ 

 “ LOL my little sister was running in a tube and fell over and now I’m Dying “

Lucius: "I was gonna give you a half-empty, already opened pack of watermelon Sour Patches, but you were in the shower so I ate them all”

 “ Yaxley’s first name is Corban. I didn’t know that. ”

Narcissa:  “ Never thought I’d be crying over the Wicked Witch “

Neville:  “ I always thought Heathers was Heathens by Tøp but misspelled to mess with people? For like a whole year, I thought this, until I found out it was a musical. ”

   “ with magicians, you can never tell what’s real. Like, did he really read your mind or just do a trick? Was that a fake eyeball in colored water or did he just drink formaldehyde? You never can tell”

“ when I’m scared I sing 'let it go’. so if we’re ever hanging out and I have to leave the room and i start singing let it go really quietly, i’m scared. “

Xenophilius: “ So I came up with a theory that Luke Skywalker burnt his OWN home down because uncle Owen didn’t let him go to the Toche station to pick up some power converters and this is probably the weirdest theory I have ever come up with LOL “ 

Minerva:” If tired was a drug I’d be high off my ass right now ”

Arthur: “ I wish I had a Blue-Rey player so I could watch the Force Awakens with Rey being blue “

“ so one Time I Was in Walmart Waiting to Cross and a Old Guy on A scooter Wheelchair Past us and a Few Seconds after he past Another old Guy Crossed on one and I think They Were Racing I’m not Lying “

Umbridge: “ Here’s the Speech that Will Help me With Something Along the way to Greatness Ready? 'ACHECHEM.“ (Throat clearing noise) “

“i swear sometimes my mouth seems like it has autocomplete. wildly inaccurate autocomplete. “

George: *wearing a spider-man costume*  “I know Batman has pretty shredded abs, but Spider-Man does too! “ 

“ That awkward moment when you make a Yo Mama joke on your sibling “

(In connection to the above autocomplete quote) “ for example i started to say as i was saying, but instead said "At the same time as i was saying.”

Draco:  “No regrets,” I say, already feeling regrets”  

 (about choosing a tv show) “ and people say choosing a College is tricky ooh big deal it’s the next four years of your life this is my Saturday night!” 

  “Sharpay. Sharpay is the most delicious thing on the whole dang planet”

Ron: “ Tell me why! (Ain’t nothin but a heartache) Tell me why! (ain’t nothin but a milkshake) “ 

” Hope my FBI agent(in my camera) just got a good  look at the Almond Joy snack mix he’s not getting any of! “

“Hamilton during Say No To This is me when I’m already full but my sister isn’t going to finish her dessert “

Hermione: “ Malfoy shut up you’re like ten “ 

 “ Scientific studies have shown that existing on Earth is the leading cause of death in human beings “

Ginny:  “I will dislocate your children”

 “ So the first time I heard about the Winchesters (from Supernatural), I thought they was talking about the lady who had to build that haunted house. “

(to Fleur) “ Don’t get all french with me “

Dumbledore:  “Why does pain exist, but as a harsh reminder of reality?
Why do Pringles taste so good, but so sal-i-ty? ”

 “The words “dang, son” have become a permanent part of my inner monologue”

Hagrid: “ I would kill someone if they hurt my hypothetical cat. For real, Filch is a jerk but I mean his rage over Mrs Norris is totally understandable “

Lavender:  “ My brain is so weird. I read the words "scrabble tournament” and then saw a picture of a squirrel. I was fine. Then there was a picture of a cute guy and my brain malfunctioned and I got “squirrel tournament”

 “ She was currently locking lips with her future husband I mean what I didn’t say anything “

Bellatrix:  “That’s a sexy zombie." 

 “ I can see why people call their significant other food names cause food is the best thing in the world so they call each other food names like Sugar Honey Baby and Cheeseburger “ 

 “ LOL my little sister was running in a tube and fell over and now I’m Dying “

Lucius: "I was gonna give you a half-empty, already opened pack of watermelon Sour Patches, but you were in the shower so I ate them all”

 “ Yaxley’s first name is Corban. I didn’t know that. ”

Narcissa:  “ Never thought I’d be crying over the Wicked Witch “

Neville:  “ I always thought Heathers was Heathens by Tøp but misspelled to mess with people? For like a whole year, I thought this, until I found out it was a musical. ”

   “ with magicians, you can never tell what’s real. Like, did he really read your mind or just do a trick? Was that a fake eyeball in colored water or did he just drink formaldehyde? You never can tell”

“ when I’m scared I sing 'let it go’. so if we’re ever hanging out and I have to leave the room and i start singing let it go really quietly, i’m scared. “

Xenophilius: “ So I came up with a theory that Luke Skywalker burnt his OWN home down because uncle Owen didn’t let him go to the Toche station to pick up some power converters and this is probably the weirdest theory I have ever come up with LOL “ 

Minerva:” If tired was a drug I’d be high off my ass right now ”

Arthur: “ I wish I had a Blue-Rey player so I could watch the Force Awakens with Rey being blue “

“ so one Time I Was in Walmart Waiting to Cross and a Old Guy on A scooter Wheelchair Past us and a Few Seconds after he past Another old Guy Crossed on one and I think They Were Racing I’m not Lying “

Umbridge: “ Here’s the Speech that Will Help me With Something Along the way to Greatness Ready? 'ACHECHEM.“ (Throat clearing noise) “

blog.description: She/Her! MCU-addict (specializes in loving Tony Stark and the Stark Family, including but not limited to IronDad & Spider-Son and Pepperony)! Loves Harringrove and Stranger Things but doesn't have Netflix (figure that one out)! Loves Dean WInchester, Brooke Davis, Tony Dinozzo, Jake Peralta, Tahani Al Jamil, The Doctor, Han Solo, Jim Kirk, Kara Danvers, Barry Allen, and MOST of the characters that come with all of them!

summary:
Dumbledore: If I ever had a son, I imagine he would be just like you.
*Harry smiles*
Dumbledore:...Perhaps that's why I never...
body:
Dumbledore: If I ever had a son, I imagine he would be just like you.
*Harry smiles*
Dumbledore:...Perhaps that's why I never reproduced.

dialogue.name: Dumbledore
dialogue.label: Dumbledore:
dialogue.phrase: If I ever had a son, I imagine he would be just like you.
